Package algorithms.concurrency.diningPhilosophers

Class EvenOdd

java.lang.Object
algorithms.concurrency.diningPhilosophers.AbstractDiningPhilosophers
algorithms.concurrency.diningPhilosophers.EvenOdd
public class EvenOdd extends AbstractDiningPhilosophers
a toy model close to sequential for timing comparisons. All odd numbered diners eat then all even numbered diners eat.
